profile:
The Sprinkler Company Inc. specializes in the design, installation and maintenance of automatic lawn and garden watering systems, garden lighting systems for private and commercial property and full services on Landscaping Design. Sprinkler company also offers servicing of all types of existing irrigation systems, including system opening, closure, and repairs. 
***
We provide 5 YEARS WARRANTY FOR ALL OUR INSTALLATIONS.
***
More information on www.SprinklerCompany.ca
***
Please call us for FREE ESTIMATION.
***
Due to the situation with Covid-19, our company has become available online consultation, in some cases it is possible to conduct an online assessment of the planned installation.
The company continue to work officially. If you need help with seasonal Start-Up/Testing of the sprinkler system or any emergency service, we are ready to help you! All our technicians respect the social distance and have all the necessary equipment in the current situation regarding to COVID-19!

profile:
Pro Green Irrigation is a lawn sprinkler professional, offering a wide variety of services, which includes new installations, service to existing systems, and annual maintenance programs. Pro Green manufactures a time-controlled underground sprinkler system which eliminates the routine and monotonous job of hand watering and also savers water.  

***

The Automatic Sprinkler Systems from Pro Green Irrigation and gives your valuable landscape the uniform coverage it needs to stay healthy and vigorous.
Pro Green Irrigation is a family business with all of the advantages of a large company. While our focus is on residential customers, Pro Green also installs and services commercial systems in strip malls, warehouses, subway stations, hospitals, golf course club houses and office buildings. Whether you're a homeowner, developer, management company or general contractor, our goal is to give you the caring attention of a small family-run business, while maintaining a professional approach to our nearly 1500 customers.

***

One of the main advantages of working with Pro Green Irrigation is our experienced staff, including two full-time installation crews and three professional servicemen. We also have a full office staff, year round employees, and seven fully equipped vehicles. You can trust that Pro Green Irrigation will be around, year in and year out, to service your system and honor our comprehensive 5-Year Warranty *. For all these reasons and many more, Pro Green Irrigation is your lawn sprinkler professional. Pro Green Irrigation is a member of Landscape Ontario and the Canadian Nursery Landscape Association. We continually upgrade our skills with training that keeps us on the cutting edge of irrigation technology. If you would like to see a Pro Green Irrigation system in your area, we'll be happy to give you a list of referrals.

***

*Ask about our 5-year warranty

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your property’s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your home’s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

profile: Green Earth Irrigation was established in December, 2000. We design, install and maintain systems that save you time and money. We also save your lawn, flowers and trees by efficiently distributing water to your garden. By installing an Automatic Irrigation System, the ground will not get flooded. It gives control over where, when and how much water is being used, and the choice to apply small amounts of water over long periods of time. This allows the moisture to soak in to the ground for maximum efficiency, minimal water and evaporation, in addition to reducing water usage. The cost of water is increasing quickly across Canada and throughout the world. In today’s economic climate this is a big concern. Everyone is looking for ways to save money on energy and water costs….Green Earth Irrigation is the way to accomplish this! Please call…….
services: Repair Irrigation System, Design & Install New System, Install Garden Lighting, Sprinkler Systems
name: Green Earth Irrigation

profile: Royal Stone is a recognized installer of premier interlocking paving stones, retaining walls, steps, curbs, and natural stone products. Whether you're designing a complete streetscape or a residential walkway, patio and driveway, Royal Stone can provide you with a range of applications. Our qualified staff will take your project from the design stage to completion in an organized and professional manner. Let your surroundings express who you are. Royal Stone's experienced landscape designers will guide you in selecting features that come together to create balance and harmony. Our use of hand drawn and computer-generated renderings effectively bridge the gap between concept and reality, assuring our clients that their new surroundsing will be all that they envisioned - and more. DRIVEWAYS / WALKWAYS Driveways and walkways provide curb appearl to homes. They are a point of artistic expression allowing customers to express their personal style. OUTDOOR LIVING Outdoor living spaces provide an impressive focal point where you can relax, dine and entertain with familiy and friends. Outdoor kitchens, fireplaces and firepits are just some of the possibilities. POOLS Pools provide an impressive focal point where you can relax and entertain with family and friends. Spas are great alternative for spaces wehre a pool is not feasible. WE SPECIALIZE IN Driveways, Walkways, Interlocking Stone, Flagstone, Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs, Water Features, Inifinity Edge, Landscaping, Patios, Cabanas, Gazebos, Outdoor Kitchens & Fireplaces

profile:
Professionally installed landscape lighting system and audio. 

Let us help you enjoy your outdoor living area at night while improving curb appeal, safety and security. We'll create the perfect ambiance for your family and guests.

Operated by professionals with over 15 years of experience in the landscape and construction trades. Our mission is to help customers enhance the visual appeal of their outdoor living space while extending the hours of use, increase safety and adding value to their property. From an entertaining night with friends and family to a warming environment for a romantic night, The Lightscapers provide the best services to ensure your outdoor spaces look their best. Let us improve the curb appeal of your property and create a welcoming and safe ambiance when you pull into your driveway at night.

We are proud to utilize top-of-the-line materials, including fixtures, transformers, LED bulbs, waterproof connectors, wire and timers (mechanical, digital astronomical and WiFi available), from the best manufacturers in North America, such as FX Luminaire, Vista Lighting, Kichler, Unique Lighting, In-Lite, Brilliance and Truaudio. These long-lasting, high-quality products also have great design and finish, which will exceed your expectations.

We will go the extra mile to ensure our customers are happy and satisfied with our services.
brands: FX Luminaire / Kichler Lighting / Unique Lighting / In-Lite Design / Vista PRO / Brilliance LED / WAC Lighting
name: The Lightscapers - Landscape Lighting & Audio

profile:
Northern Lights and Rainmakers Inc. is a family owned and operated landscaping business that has been proudly serving the GTA and surrounding areas for more than 10 years.
***
We specialize in irrigation, lawn care and landscape lighting using the best products available in the industry today including Rain-Bird, Hunter, Toro, Vista, Hadco, etc, thus assuring our customers’ satisfaction for many years to come.
***
We realize that you, our clients, are the lynchpin of our company and that it is your word of mouth recommendations that generate a large percentage of our new business. This is one good reason why we strive daily to renew our reputation for excellent, reliable and honest service and professional workmanship..
But we also take pride in a job well done and get a great deal of satisfaction breathing new life into your gardens and landscapes and seeing them bloom anew after just one or two visits from our work-teams.
name: Northern Rainmakers

profile:
Urban Irrigation Solutions uses the latest technology in irrigation engineering, design and water conservation to create more sustainable and abundant landscapes. We offer irrigation design, installation and maintenance for commercial and residential landscapes in the Greater Toronto Area.

We also offer landscape lighting design, installation and maintenance to create a beautiful landscape to be enjoyed when the sun goes down as well as providing safety and security for the home owner.
products:
Water smart wifi timers
Rain sensors
Moisture monitors
Weather stations
Water efficient sprinkler heads
Drip irrigation
Smart water scheduling
services:

Water conservation consultations

Urban farming
Permaculture design
specialities:
